wordpressPage.title: Toilet Roll Ice Breaker
wordpressPage.content:
Equipment Needed: A toilet roll and a bin/plastic bag

Invite the young people to pass the toilet roll around the circle and take the amount that they would use for a number two!

Once everyone has done it (someone usually takes a ridiculous amount!) explain that the bag/bucket will be passed round and each time it comes to a person they must take 1 sheet of their toilet paper and place it in the bag whilst sharing something about themselves.

This is a great ice breaker for a new group….you can only ever really use it once though!
